statements: SELECT * FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age > 100
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_location FROM FossilRecords ORDER BY fossil_age DESC
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_location FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age < 50 ORDER BY fossil_name ASC
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_age FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_location LIKE 'North%'
SELECT * FROM FossilRecords LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age > 100 ORDER BY fossil_name DESC;
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_location FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age < 500 ORDER BY fossil_id ASC;
SELECT fossil_id, fossil_name FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_location = 'Africa' AND fossil_age BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY fossil_id DESC;
SELECT fossil_id, fossil_name, fossil_location, fossil_age FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age <= 300 ORDER BY fossil_age ASC, fossil_location DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT fossil_location FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age < 500 ORDER BY fossil_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM fossil_records;
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_type FROM fossil_records WHERE fossil_age > 100;
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_type FROM fossil_records ORDER BY fossil_age DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_records;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_records WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_type FROM fossil_records WHERE fossil_age > 100 ORDER BY fossil_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fossil_records WHERE fossil_type = 'Dinosaur' AND fossil_age BETWEEN 65 AND 150
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_records WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY research_topic DESC
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_age FROM fossil_records WHERE fossil_type = 'Shell' ORDER BY fossil_age DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM research_records WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'Dr.%'
SELECT * FROM FossilRecords;
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_type FROM FossilRecords ORDER BY fossil_name DESC;
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_age FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_type = 'Dinosaur';
SELECT * FROM ResearcherInfo WHERE researcher_affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM ResearchPublications ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FossilRecords;
SELECT fossil_name, fossil_age FROM FossilRecords WHERE fossil_age > 100;
SELECT researcher_name, publication_title FROM ResearcherInfo, ResearchPublications WHERE ResearcherInfo.researcher_id = ResearchPublications.researcher_id;
SELECT fossil_name, discovery_location FROM FossilRecords ORDER BY fossil_age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_field FROM ResearcherInfo;
SELECT * FROM FossilLocation;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FossilLocation;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FossilLocation WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FossilSpecimen WHERE specimen_type = 'Dinosaur';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, researcher_affiliation FROM Researcher;
SELECT * FROM FossilLocation WHERE location_name = 'Sahara Desert'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FossilLocation WHERE latitude > 0
SELECT * FROM FossilSpecimen INNER JOIN FossilLocation ON FossilSpecimen.location_id = FossilLocation.location_id WHERE FossilSpecimen.specimen_age > 100
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM ResearchPublication ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT Researcher.researcher_name, ResearchPublication.publication_title FROM Researcher JOIN ResearchPublication ON Researcher.researcher_id = ResearchPublication.researcher_id
SELECT fossil_id, fossil_name, fossil_type FROM fossils;
SELECT fossil_name, discovery_date FROM fossils WHERE fossil_type = 'Ammonite';
SELECT fossil_name, discovery_location FROM fossils WHERE discovery_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fossils ORDER BY discovery_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_fossils FROM fossils GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM fossils WHERE fossil_type = 'Dinosaur' ORDER BY discovery_date DESC
SELECT fossil_name, discovery_location FROM fossils WHERE researcher_id = 101 ORDER BY fossil_name ASC
SELECT fossil_id, fossil_name, discovery_date FROM fossils WHERE discovery_location = 'Utah' AND fossil_type = 'Mammoth'
SELECT * FROM fossils WHERE discovery_location != 'China' AND fossil_type = 'Reptile' ORDER BY fossil_id DESC
SELECT fossil_name, researcher_id FROM fossils WHERE discovery_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
